entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:07 p.m. EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 12:12 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of rain or snow in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 12:12 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
